segments.text: Good evening . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like to check in , please . M y name is Peter Wang . I have a reservation for three nights .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just a moment , please . Oh , yes . One twin and one single . Is that right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'm with my wife and child .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will you fill out this form , please ?
segments.speaker: S1
